INSERT /** 综合:往中间表插入组织变动信息 **/ INTO BSE.T_BAS_ORG_MIDDLETABLE A (
) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{airDispatch, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{arrangeBizType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arrangeOutfield, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billingGroup, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{complementSimpleName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryRegion, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverOutfield, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depCoordinate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptArea, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countyCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dispatchTeam, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{doAirDispatch, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{expressBigRegion, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{expressBranch, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{expressPart, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{expressSalesDepartment, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{expressSorting, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isArrangeGoods, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isDeliverSchedule, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isEntityFinance, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{bigRegion, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{division, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isSecurity, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smallRegion, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pinyin, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesDepartment, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{transDepartment, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{transTeam, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{transferCenter, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{divisionCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgSimpleName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unifiedCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgPhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgFax, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgZipCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isManageDepartment, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{operateType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_timestamp(#{modifyDateOfUU, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss.ff'), to_timestamp('9999-12-31 23:59:59.0', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss.ff'), #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{failCount, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, systimestamp, to_timestamp(#{modifyDateOfUU, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss.ff') )
mapper.update:
UPDATE /** 综合:根据条件修改中间表数据 **/ BSE.T_BAS_ORG_MIDDLETABLE A SET
A.FAILCOUNT=#{failCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.SENDSTATUS=#{sendStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.UPDATETIME = systimestamp
mapper.select:
SELECT /** 综合:根据条件查询中间表数据 **/
FROM BSE.T_BAS_ORG_MIDDLETABLE A
mapper.update:
UPDATE /** 综合:根据ID List修改中间表数据 **/ BSE.T_BAS_ORG_MIDDLETABLE A SET
A.FAILCOUNT=#{failCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.SENDSTATUS=#{sendStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.UPDATETIME = systimestamp
A.ID IN
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
INSERT /** 综合:往FOSS归属字段小时间链表插入组织变动信息 **/ INTO BSE.t_Bas_Fosscolumn A (
) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{airDispatch, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{arrangeBizType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arrangeOutfield, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billingGroup, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{complementSimpleName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryRegion, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverOutfield, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depCoordinate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptArea, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countyCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dispatchTeam, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{doAirDispatch, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{expressBigRegion, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{expressBranch, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{expressPart, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{expressSalesDepartment, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{expressSorting, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isArrangeGoods, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isDeliverSchedule, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isEntityFinance, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{bigRegion, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{division, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isSecurity, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smallRegion, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pinyin, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesDepartment, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{transDepartment, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{transTeam, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{transferCenter, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{divisionCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgSimpleName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unifiedCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgPhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgFax, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgZipCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isManageDepartment,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{versionNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{orgEnSimple, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_timestamp(#{modifyDateOfUU, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss.ff'), to_timestamp('9999-12-31 23:59:59.0', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss.ff'), #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{failCount, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, systimestamp, systimestamp )
mapper.update:
UPDATE /** 综合:根据条件修改中间表数据 **/ BSE.t_Bas_Fosscolumn A SET A.MODIFY_TIME = to_timestamp(#{modifyDateOfUU, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss.ff')
A.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT /** 综合:根据条件查询中间表数据 **/
FROM BSE.t_Bas_Fosscolumn A
A.UNIFIED_CODE=#{unifiedCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by A.CREATE_TIME DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT/** 综合:插入FOSS下游中间表数据 **/ INTO BSE.T_BAS_MIDTABLE( ID, CODE, NAME, PINYIN, UNIFIED_CODE, LEADER, PRINCIPAL_NO, PARENT_ORG_NAME, PARENT_ORG_UNIFIED_CODE, SUBSIDIARY_CODE, COST_CENTER_CODE, STATUS, END_TIME, BEGIN_TIME, DIVISION, DIVISION_CODE, BIG_REGION, SMALL_REGION, ADDRESS, DEPT_AREA, PROV_CODE, CITY_CODE, COUNTY_CODE, SALES_DEPARTMENT, TRANSFER_CENTER, EXPRESS_BIG_REGION, EXPRESS_SALES_DEPARTMENT, EXPRESS_PART, EXPRESS_BRANCH, DO_AIR_DISPATCH, TRANS_DEPARTMENT, DISPATCH_TEAM, BILLING_GROUP, TRANS_TEAM, IS_DELIVER_SCHEDULE, IS_ARRANGE_GOODS, DELIVER_OUTFIELD, ARRANGE_OUTFIELD, ARRANGE_BIZ_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, ACTIVE, CREATE_USER_CODE, MODIFY_USER_CODE, AIR_DISPATCH, IS_ENTITY_FINANCE, ENTITY_FINANCE, DEP_COORDINATE, DEP_TELEPHONE, DEP_FAX, ORG_SIMPLE_NAME,
COUNTRY_REGION, ORG_EN_SIMPLE, DEPT_DESC, VERSION_NO, PARENT_ORG_CODE,
UUMS_ID, UUMS_PARENT_ID, UUMS_IDS,
IS_LEAF, DISPLAY_ORDER, DEPT_LEVEL, AREA_CODE, DEPT_EMAIL, ZIP_CODE, DEPT_ATTRIBUTE, CANCELED_SYSTEMS, EHR_DEPT_CODE, ORG_LEVEL, COMPLEMENT_SIMPLE_NAME, ISSECURITY, EXPRESS_SORTING, IS_MANAGE_DEPARTMENT, INTERFACESTATUS, OPERATETIME, EXCEPTION_MSG, NUM, FOSS_ID ) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pinyin, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unifiedCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leader, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principalNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentOrgName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentOrgUnifiedCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subsidiaryCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{costCenterCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{beginTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{division, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{divisionCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bigRegion, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{smallRegion, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptArea, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countyCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesDepartment, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{transferCenter, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{expressBigRegion, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{expressSalesDepartment, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{expressPart, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{expressBranch, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{doAirDispatch, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{transDepartment, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dispatchTeam, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{billingGroup, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{transTeam, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isDeliverSchedule, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isArrangeGoods, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{deliverOutfield, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arrangeOutfield, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arrangeBizType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_timestamp(#{createDateOfUU, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss.ff'), to_timestamp(#{modifyDateOfUU, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss.ff'), #{active, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{airDispatch, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isEntityFinance, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{entityFinance, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depCoordinate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depTelephone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depFax, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgSimpleName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{countryRegion, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgEnSimple, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{parentOrgCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{uumsId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uumsParentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uumsIds, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isLeaf, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{displayOrder, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptLevel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptAttribute, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{canceledSystems, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ehrDeptCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgLevel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{complementSimpleName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSecurity, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expressSorting, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isManageDepartment, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{interfaceStatus, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{operateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{exceptionMsg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fossId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
SELECT /** 综合:根据存储过程返回时间查询UUMS至FOSS的中间表 **/
FROM BSE.T_BAS_MIDTABLE A
A.UNIFIED_CODE=#{unifiedCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.CREATE_TIME=to_timestamp(#{createDateOfUU, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss.ff')
AND A.OPERATETIME=to_timestamp(#{operateTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss.ff')
mapper.delete: delete/** 综合:删除FOSS下游中间表数据 **/ from BSE.T_BAS_MIDTABLE A where A.FOSS_ID= #{fossId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT /** 综合:查询sending状态的修改时间与当前时间之差超过半小时的实体 **/
FROM BSE.t_Bas_Org_Middletable A
A.sendstatus='SENDING' and ceil((sysdate - to_date(to_char(A.updatetime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) * 24 * 60) > 30
